channel.title: Is there any way to recover saves?
channel.description: I was trying to do The new achievement, "The Rarest Specimen" I saved and started up a new game, but accidentally I quicksaved too much and my progress with the hat is gone, it doesn't show up in the "Load game" menu. So, is there any way to bring those saves back?

item.title: Is there any way to recover saves?
item.dc:creator: Milloni
item.description:
Thanks to both of you guys.

Read full topic
item.source: Is there any way to recover saves?

item.title: Is there any way to recover saves?
item.dc:creator: Flavrans
item.description:
You could check if an older save is still present in Steam Cloud, where you can download it:

https://store.steampowered.com/account/remotestorageapp/?appid=362890

If Black Mesa is still running, don’t quit it yet, or the older saves will likely be deleted/overwritten in Steam Cloud.

This only applies if Steam Cloud synchronization is enabled for Black Mesa (which is it usually is unless you disabled it.)

Read full topic
item.source: Is there any way to recover saves?

item.title: Is there any way to recover saves?
item.dc:creator: RedEye9
item.description:
No need to recover the save.

steamcommunity.com

Steam Community :: Guide :: "Rare Specimen" - The Effortless Way

Please ignore any other variations of this method as they will not work, and rip off my original Facepunch post. I do not recommend using this method unless you are impatient, an achievement hunter

Read full topic
